title: PlayStation Kills the Middleman - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.25.19
description:
Blessing Adeoye Jr. and Greg debate if PlayStation selling directly to consumers is the first shot in a war against brick and mortar shops.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:48 - Housekeeping
New Party Mode on Patreon! Jackbox Party Mode’s Fakin’ It with Chloe! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PNgCEmN73CI&list=PLy3mMHt2i7RKVhcHaGd5Dwt4AIV8uS3YA
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
http://www.patreon.com/ReRetroGames
Black Jack
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:40 - PlayStation State of Play Report
00:07:10 Best Friend Q. - I'm sure you already covered the Modern Warfare Spec Ops mode controversy today and its value across the different platforms. There's a lot of blame going towards Activision right now about how they're devaluing the Xbox and PC versions of the game while PS4 gets more value per dollar with the exclusive mode, but why is no one blaming Sony? - Colton Nesler
00:37:12 Best Friend Q. - Does the PlayStation community need to re-calibrate their expectations of what a "State of Play" actually is? Mostly indie titles with the rare showing of a AAA game we already know about. Or should Sony only have a "State of Play" when they have something substantial to reveal / discuss in detail? - Black Jack
00:46:35 - Inside Xbox News
00:51:00 - PlayStation is selling straight to you
00:58:20 - Oculus Breaking news
00:58:30 - Switch Lite is Popular, Analyst Daniel Ahmad @ZhugeEX
00:59:42 - Mafia 4 AND Mafia 2 Remastered?! Saqib Mansoor @ SementNext.com
01:01:25 - Team Fight Tactics for LoL is incredibly popular, Riot
01:03:15 -  Upstart
01:05:35 - Out today
Reader mail   -
01:09:15 - Do you think Nintendo's attempt at microtransactions will work here or will there be another angry internet mob? - Frankfurtter
01:14:30 - Squad Up: Parker(PS4) - Jmak99
01:15:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Peer
